item.sql: SELETC t.* FROM (SELECT RID FROM (SELECT R.RID, ROWNUM LINENUM FROM (SELECT t.rowid RID FROM @name t WHERE 1=1 {&@t.CreateTime >= to_date($ST,'YYYY-MM-DD')} {&@t.CreateTime < to_date($ET,'YYYY-MM-DD')} @filters ORDER BY t.CreateTime DESC) R WHERE ROWNUM <= { :PS} * { :PI}) WHERE LINENUM > { :PS} * ({ :PI} - 1)) tab inner join @name t on tab.rid = t.rowid
